sentences.en: ‘I can't come because I'm working late.’ ‘Fair enough.’.
sentences.cn: “我来不了，因为要干到很晚。”“没问题。”。

sentences.en: £150 is a fair price.
sentences.cn: 150英镑是个合理的价钱。

sentences.en: a fair maiden
sentences.cn: 美丽的少女

sentences.en: A fair number of people came along.
sentences.cn: 有相当多的人来了。

sentences.en: a horse fair
sentences.cn: 马市

sentences.en: All we are asking for is a fair wage.
sentences.cn: 我们所要求的只是一份合理的薪水。

sentences.en: Fair dos—you don't believe I've been idle all this time?.
sentences.cn: 公正点吧——你不会认为我成天都在混时间吧？。

sentences.en: Fair go! How can I ask a thing like that?.
sentences.cn: 讲点儿道理！我怎么能问这样的事？。

sentences.en: Fair's fair—we were here first.
sentences.cn: 事实就是事实——是我们先到这儿。

sentences.en: He is scrupulously fair, and popular with his staff.
sentences.cn: 他廉洁公正，深受员工爱戴。

sentences.en: Her voice breaking with emotion, she told him: "It doesn't seem fair".
sentences.cn: 她激动得声音颤抖，对他说：“这好像不公平吧。”

sentences.en: I have a fair idea of how difficult things can be.
sentences.cn: 我大致了解情况会有多困难。

sentences.en: In international trade, very few countries play fair.
sentences.cn: 在国际贸易中，很少有国家遵守游戏规则。

sentences.en: It should be fair.
sentences.cn: 考试应该是公平的。

sentences.en: It's a fair guess to say that the damage will be extensive.
sentences.cn: 说损失会很严重想必猜得不错。

sentences.en: It's not very fair to blame me for that.
sentences.cn: 为那件事而埋怨我是不太公平的。

sentences.en: It's only fair to let her know that you intend to apply.
sentences.cn: 告诉她你打算申请，这才算公平嘛。

sentences.en: Life isn’t always fair.
sentences.cn: 生活并非总是公平的。

sentences.en: My boss expects a lot – but he’s very fair.
sentences.cn: 我的老板要求很高——但是他很公平。

sentences.en: She is one of the most fair-minded people I know.
sentences.cn: 她是我所认识的最公正的人之一。

sentences.en: She said she wanted most of all to be fair.
sentences.cn: 她说她最想要的是公平。

sentences.en: That is not fair.
sentences.cn: 那是不公平的。

sentences.en: The judge said that arbitration was a fair and expeditious decision-making process.
sentences.cn: 法官说仲裁是公平且迅速有效的判决过程。

sentences.en: the question caught him fair off his guard
The report is a fair summary of the issues facing us.
sentences.cn: 这份报告对我们所面临的问题做了一个适当的总结。

sentences.en: The reporting of the hostage story was fair, if sometimes overblown.
sentences.cn: 尽管这篇关于人质的报道有些夸大其词，但还算公正。

sentences.en: The secret of success is honesty and fair dealing.
sentences.cn: 成功的秘诀在于诚实和公平交易。

sentences.en: The signs suggest that the elections will be non-violent and fair.
sentences.cn: 种种迹象表明选举将会是非暴力的、公正的。

sentences.en: The team also won praise for sportsmanship and fair play.
sentences.cn: 该队还因其良好的体育精神及公平竞争精神而受到了表扬。

sentences.en: they were determined to ensure victory for themselves, by fair means or foul.
sentences.cn: 他们决心无论如何也要取得胜利。

sentences.en: Was it fair to compare independent schools with state schools?
sentences.cn: 拿私立学校与州立学校相比，这样公平吗？

sentences.en: We stand for fair play.
sentences.cn: 我们主张公平竞赛。

sentences.en: Weber gave a fair hearing to anyone who held a different opinion.
sentences.cn: 韦伯让持不同意见的人都能有机会发表意见。

sentences.en: What do you think is the fairest solution?
sentences.cn: 你认为最合理的解决方式是什么？

sentences.en: Why does Eric get to go and I don’t? It’s not fair!
sentences.cn: 为什么埃里克能去我不能？这不公平！

sentences.en: Women must receive their fair share of training for good-paying jobs.
sentences.cn: 女性必须获得她们理应得到的高薪工作培训。

sentences.en: you are in a fair way to have cured yourself.
sentences.cn: 你就快治好自己了。

sentences.en: You've all ganged up against me, it's not fair.
sentences.cn: 你们一帮人结伙反对我，这不公平。
